title: Can't Login (Unable to Connect to Login Queue)
body:
When I try to login, my client says Authenticating, then says "Unable to Connect to Login Queue". 

To save some time and potentially help out the resolution process, here is a PasteBin of my LoLClient log file: https://pastebin.com/Wwb9X8zw

replies.body: As soon i was going to play with my friends to play league, i had the Unable to login queue this morning and wondering if someone knows what the problem is or is there anyway of fixing this pls help.{{item:3073}}
You are not alone. Exact same story here. dont bother repairing or reinstalling your client. i just did both of those and still getting the same error message. RIOT PLEASE!!!
yup not working after reinstallation.. trash
Same happened to me this morning... Riot plz help!!
same here, can't even login on other servers
can log in either dammit
same. im also in NA
Same
Same here, its probably an OCE problem... dammit ;({{item:3073}}
I reckon just try play tomorrow or in an hour even though we are thirsty to play league I reckon it'll be fine after a couple of hours.
Hey Sumiyaki, you should be good to go now for NA. Sorry about that. I made a change on the wrong service and impacted login a bit. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Still can't login for some reason.
Happening again ;-;
I am not able to login now its running properly before 7.14 patch i was playing everything is perfect. I exit client and try to login and this is showing unable to login pls help anyone
me too welp D: (only one in oce lol)
I cant log in either :((((

you're not alone

rip
I am having this trouble with OCE as well...
also having this problem on OCE
Still no fix for this?
I just started having this problem TODAY  ugh, no fix no fix. :(
Try disabling sound in client settings
I didn't try logging in again with the sound and directly tired to do what you said which is to disable the sound before logging in. Well I'm up voting this one in case it might work for the others.
I just went to the settings on the client and disabled sound and it worked for somereason and reenablled it after log in
That worked for me too
I got the same problem today then I found your post and It worked!!!
yesterday after i patched my client and play lol after i close the client and reopen it that happened... please riot help us...  i can't log in for some reason
The EXACT same thing happened to me too
Same here !! Can't login in in HK

same here, i tried to log in once in hk but after i play 2 laggy games and i wanna try to reboot my computer.
the same thing is happening again{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

Been waiting for 8hrs to play but still cant login. It says "Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here If it looks good, follow the guide here" tried both of it and nothing works. Can anyone tell me what is happened and did you guys have the same issues here? 

Come on rito. I need to play. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
still cant login NA fml
"Unable to connect to the login queue" Everything seems fine in the server status page ... Played about 6 hours ago , worked fine. riot pls
saaame... i played yesterday at it was fine but now i cant play. i also reinstalled my league but it still didnt work. TRASH

If you have an issue with the login stuff please post here!

I am directing people to this thread.
Got the same issue trying to connect to login server on oceania server
I am having the same problem. I am trying to connect to NA Server
cannot connect to login que plz help!!!!
Same problem but disabling sound on client settings worked for me must be a bug.
I am having this problem now. I am in Na playing on Na server... I dont see why it is doing this. Can someone please help me out before i have to reinstall minecraft.
OMG IT WORKED RIGHT AFTER I POSTED THIS
I posted about 5 days ago on my own thread, have yet to get it working. Playing from NA and in NA so I don't know what the issue is.
I am having this issue too. Worked no problem last night and I can't get in now. Can someone let me know the fix please

Unable to login to NA server. Can anyone help me pleaseeeeeeeeeeeeee

P.S. I am playing from Europe

Did anyone have the same problem?
Same for me :( Im on EUW but cant login. Unable to connect to login queue, I tried changing my resolution or full repair and it didnt work.
Is there a fix to this? I'm having Issues right now
Same problem here I can't log in it says Authenticating and doesn't move from there... like i can't even open Support window on homepage of league of legends whats happening??

I have the same problem and it's REALLY frustrating to deal with. its been going on for 3 days rn, please help riot. - EUW
Thanks.
I tried EVERYTHING and then saw a comment on here about disabling the sound in the settings menu on the client and trying again. I have not a clue why, but that worked for me. Good luck!
